item.title: Barrows compile error picture inside.!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

No, you have to delete this:

else if(useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4273, getItemSlot(4273), 1);
sendMessage("Gratz , Round 1 is done 4 rounds left");
SummonNewNPC(2880);
}
else if(useItemID == 5585 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(5585, getItemSlot(5585), 1);
sendMessage("Gratz , Round 2 is done 3 rounds left");
SummonNewNPC(49);
}
else if (useItemID == 4272 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4272, getItemSlot(4272), 1);
sendMessage("Gratz , Round 3 is done 2 rounds left");
SummonNewNPC(795);
}
else if(useItemID == 4078 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4078, getItemSlot(4078), 1);
sendMessage("Gratz , Round 4 done , 1 round left - Prepare your for the big fight ..");
SummonNewNPC(509);
}
else if(useItemID == 6104 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(6104, getItemSlot(6104), 1);
sendMessage("Gratz , You are awarded your fighter torso now :D");
addItem(6384,1);
}

accidently put my fighter torso game in it

item.title: Barrows compile error picture inside.!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

lmao some of you are dumb…

find the line and take out the else

it explains it on the flipping compiler!

else if (useItemID == 772 && atObjectID == 5245) { //this is the bit compiler doesnt like! deleteItem(772, getItemSlot(772), 1); teleportToX = 3552; teleportToY = 9675; sendMessage("Welcome to barrows"); sendMessage("Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the WESTERN door"); }

to this

if (useItemID == 772 && atObjectID == 5245) {  //this is the bit compiler doesnt like!
deleteItem(772, getItemSlot(772), 1);
		teleportToX = 3552;
		teleportToY = 9675;
sendMessage("Welcome to barrows");
sendMessage("Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the WESTERN door");
}

item.title: Barrows compile error picture inside.!
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

barrows compiler error! I was copying making a barrows error. this was the error i got:

This is some of the text i put in:

[code]
else if(useItemID == 293 && (atObjectX == 3028 && atObjectY == 3356)) {
if (absY == 3355) {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = (absY + 2);
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3028;
teleportToY = 3355;
}

else if (useItemID == 772 && atObjectID == 5245) { //this is the bit compiler doesnt like!
deleteItem(772, getItemSlot(772), 1);
teleportToX = 3552;
teleportToY = 9675;
sendMessage(“Welcome to barrows”);
sendMessage(“Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the WESTERN door”);
}
else if(useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4273, getItemSlot(4273), 1);
sendMessage(“Gratz , Round 1 is done 4 rounds left”);
SummonNewNPC(2880);
}
else if(useItemID == 5585 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(5585, getItemSlot(5585), 1);
sendMessage(“Gratz , Round 2 is done 3 rounds left”);
SummonNewNPC(49);
}
else if (useItemID == 4272 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4272, getItemSlot(4272), 1);
sendMessage(“Gratz , Round 3 is done 2 rounds left”);
SummonNewNPC(795);
}
else if(useItemID == 4078 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(4078, getItemSlot(4078), 1);
sendMessage(“Gratz , Round 4 done , 1 round left - Prepare your for the big fight …”);
SummonNewNPC(509);
}
else if(useItemID == 6104 && atObjectID == 5162) {
deleteItem(6104, getItemSlot(6104), 1);
sendMessage(“Gratz , You are awarded your fighter torso now :D”);
addItem(6384,1);
}

else if(useItemID == 85 && atObjectID == 6729) {
deleteItem(85, getItemSlot(85), 1);
sendMessage(“DO NOT RANGE OR MASS THE OPPOMENTS”);
teleportToX = 3535;
teleportToY = 9677;
sendMessage(“Kill The Next NPC For Your Next Part Of Minigame”);
sendMessage(“Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the NORTHERN door”);
}

else if(useItemID == 85 && atObjectID == 6748) {
deleteItem(85, getItemSlot(85), 1);
sendMessage(“DO NOT RANGE OR MASS THE OPPOMENTS”);
teleportToX = 3535;
teleportToY = 9677;
sendMessage(“Kill The Next NPC For Your Next Part Of Minigame”);
sendMessage(“Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the NORTHERN door”);
}

else if(useItemID == 275 && atObjectID == 6726) {
deleteItem(275, getItemSlot(275), 1);
sendMessage(“DO NOT RANGE OR MASS THE OPPOMENTS”);
teleportToX = 3533;
teleportToY = 9694;
sendMessage(“Kill The Next NPC For Your Next Part Of Minigame”);
sendMessage(“Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the NORTHERN door”);
}

else if(useItemID == 275 && atObjectID == 6745) {
deleteItem(275, getItemSlot(275), 1);
sendMessage(“DO NOT RANGE OR MASS THE OPPOMENTS”);
teleportToX = 3533;
teleportToY = 9694;
sendMessage(“Kill The Next NPC For Your Next Part Of Minigame”);
sendMessage(“Kill the opponment and then use the key it drops on the NORTHERN door”);
}[/code]

Many Thanks James.
